known_issues: Broken image due to incorrect/invalid src path: referenced filename in /assets/generated did not exist in /public/assets/generated; should use provided logo file Tshabalala-1080-x-1080-px-1-e1745416117212-r66kph3gxuhfsp0hg1525ae50su5inwh0amb0wdpkg.png (without trailing -1 in name).
Draft editor sandbox error: disallowed origin https://global-beige-1pm-draft.caffeine.xyz causing image load failures in draft environment (CORS/sandbox restriction).

existing_features.title: Update the selected navbar logo image element (XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/nav[1]/div[1]/div[1]/button[1]/img[1]`, implemented in `frontend/src/components/home/HomeNavbar.tsx`) so its `` `src` points to `/assets/generated/Tshabalala-1080-x-1080-px-1-e1745416117212-r66kph3gxuhfsp0hg1525ae50su5inwh0amb0wdpkg.png` (exactly as provided by the user, with no `-1` suffix).

new_feature_requests.summary: Ensure the static logo file `Tshabalala-1080-x-1080-px-1-e1745416117212-r66kph3gxuhfsp0hg1525ae50su5inwh0amb0wdpkg.png` exists in the frontend static assets directory at `frontend/public/assets/generated/` so it is served at `/assets/generated/Tshabalala-1080-x-1080-px-1-e1745416117212-r66kph3gxuhfsp0hg1525ae50su5inwh0amb0wdpkg.png`.

projectName: Fix navbar logo image src to point to provided logo filename
